mapper.select: SELECT t1.dbid_, t1.dbversion_, t1.execution_, t1.outcome_, t1.assignee_, t1.priority_, t1.state_, t1.create_, t1.end_, t1.duration_, t1.nextidx_, t1.supertask_ FROM JBPM4_HIST_TASK t1 WHERE t1.dbid_=#{str}
select count(*) from tabs t where t.TABLE_NAME='JBPM4_HIST_TASK_OLD'
mapper.insert: insert into JBPM4_HIST_TASK_OLD ( dbid_, dbversion_, execution_, outcome_, assignee_, priority_, state_, create_, end_, duration_, nextidx_, supertask_ ) ( select ht.dbid_, ht.dbversion_, ht.execution_, ht.outcome_, ht.assignee_, ht.priority_, ht.state_, ht.create_, ht.end_, ht.duration_, ht.nextidx_, ht.supertask_ from jbpm4_hist_task ht,jbpm4_hist_actinst ha, JBPM4_HIST_PROCINST hp where hp.dbid_=ha.hproci_ and ha.htask_=ht.dbid_ and hp.end_<=to_date(#{str},'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') and hp.state_!='active' )

insert into JBPM4_HIST_TASK_TMP ( dbid_, dbversion_, execution_, outcome_, assignee_, priority_, state_, create_, end_, duration_, nextidx_, supertask_ ) ( select ht.dbid_, ht.dbversion_, ht.execution_, ht.outcome_, ht.assignee_, ht.priority_, ht.state_, ht.create_, ht.end_, ht.duration_, ht.nextidx_, ht.supertask_ from jbpm4_hist_task ht,jbpm4_hist_actinst ha, JBPM4_HIST_PROCINST hp where hp.dbid_=ha.hproci_ and ha.htask_=ht.dbid_ and hp.end_<=to_date(#{str},'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') and hp.state_!='active' )

insert into JBPM4_HIST_TASK_OLD ( dbid_, dbversion_, execution_, outcome_, assignee_, priority_, state_, create_, end_, duration_, nextidx_, supertask_ )( SELECT t1.dbid_, t1.dbversion_, t1.execution_, t1.outcome_, t1.assignee_, t1.priority_, t1.state_, t1.create_, t1.end_, t1.duration_, t1.nextidx_, t1.supertask_ FROM JBPM4_HIST_TASK t1,jbpm4_hist_actinst ha, JBPM4_HIST_PROCINST hp where hp.dbid_=ha.hproci_ and ha.htask_=t1.dbid_ and hp.id_=#{str} )
mapper.update: create table JBPM4_HIST_TASK_OLD as select * from JBPM4_HIST_TASK a where a.dbid_=0
create table JBPM4_HIST_TASK_TMP as select * from JBPM4_HIST_TASK a where a.dbid_=0
mapper.delete: delete from jbpm4_hist_task t where exists (select temp.dbid_ from JBPM4_HIST_TASK_TMP temp where t.dbid_=temp.dbid_)
delete FROM JBPM4_HIST_TASK t1 WHERE t1.dbid_=#{str}
delete FROM JBPM4_HIST_TASK t1 WHERE t1.dbid_=#{id}
